name: PP+K
description: PP+K is the most award-winning agency in the United States with fewer than 100 employees; having been honored with more than 1,000 international and domestic awards for their creative and strategic thinking.  PP+K is an assembly of 40 passionate persons that have come together with one common mission --- to “Unite and Take Over.” Their services include brand strategy, creative strategy, traditional and experimental communications strategy, media planning and buying, metrics and analytics.
